coreAttributes.name: cursed panties
coreAttributes.description: A pair of expensive-looking panties. Don't let the name or suspiciously low value discourage you, there is nothing underhanded about them at all.

replacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the panties up to [npc.her] groin. #IF (!npc.hasStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties)) #THEN [##npc.addStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties, 31)]
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(feel)] a [style.boldBad(strange warmth)]... #ENDIF
replacementText.other:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the panties up to [npc2.namePos] groin. #IF (!npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties)) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties, 31)]
[npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(feel)] a [style.boldBad(strange warmth)]... #ENDIF
replacementText.otherRough:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the panties up to [npc2.namePos] groin so hard it practically gives [npc2.her] a wedgie. #IF (!npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties)) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties, 31)]
[npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(feel)] a [style.boldBad(strange warmth)]... #ENDIF

displacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] panties down and [npc.verb(slides)] them from [npc.her] legs. #IF (npc.getLevel() >= 50) #THEN [##npc.removeStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties)]
[npc.Name] no longer [npc.verb(feel)] the strange warmth. It seems [npc.name] [npc.was] [style.boldGood(strong enough)] to break the curse. #ELSE
Although [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] off the panties, the [style.boldBad(the strange warmth persists)]! #ENDIF
displacementText.other:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] panties down and [npc.verb(slides)] them from [npc2.her] legs. #IF (npc2.getLevel() >= 50) #THEN [##npc2.removeStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties)]
[npc2.Name] no longer [npc2.verb(feel)] the strange warmth. It seems [npc2.name] [npc2.was] [style.boldGood(strong enough)] to break the curse. #ELSE [##npc2.equipClothingFromNowhere(CT_dsg_cursed_panties_cursed_panties, true, npc2)]
The instant that the panties are no longer in contact with [npc2.name], they vanish and [style.boldBad(rematerialize)] around [npc2.her] groin! #ENDIF
displacementText.otherRough:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(rip)] off [npc2.namePos] panties. #IF (npc2.getLevel() >= 50) #THEN [##npc2.removeStatusEffect(SE_dsg_cursed_panties)]
[npc2.Name] no longer [npc2.verb(feel)] the strange warmth. It seems [npc2.name] [npc2.was] [style.boldGood(strong enough)] to break the curse. #ELSE [##npc2.equipClothingFromNowhere(CT_dsg_cursed_panties_cursed_panties, true, npc2)]
The instant that the panties are no longer in contact with [npc2.name], they vanish and [style.boldBad(rematerialize)] around [npc2.her] groin! #ENDIF

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc.her] panties back into place, covering [npc.her] groin.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc2.namePos] panties back into place, covering [npc2.her] groin.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(snap)] [npc2.namePos] panties back into place, covering [npc2.her] groin.
